msbt.message: Hey, . I saw you doing all kindsa stuff yesterday. Everybody's talking about it!A lotta folks around here need to find better hobbies than watching other folks.
! You were way in the fishing zone yesterday, weren't ya?You were catching fish super fast. I was watching, and it made my tummy grumble, .
Were you catching a buncha bugs yesterday? The bugs in my house were watching. They said it was wild.Didja take 'em to see Blathers? He loves bugs. Knows all kindsa stuff about 'em, .

! I saw you picking up a lotta shells yesterday. You doin' DIY stuff?I took a buncha shells home one day 'cause I was gonna do some DIY. But then I forgot about 'emMan, my place smelled like a gross ocean, .<10_4 /> More than usual, I mean.

I heard you were digging holes at the beach all day yesterday. Didja get a buncha clams?I call clams Squirtfaces because they squirt outta their faces. I think that's how all stuff should be named.Like you'd be Holedig yesterday, and talkto right now!<10_4 /> I'm such a Smartthink, .
Everyone's talking about how you were out of control yesterday!No balloon was safe! Pop to the left! Pop to the right! popped every balloon in sight!

I heard ya made a buncha wishes on shooting stars last night, .One time I asked a star to give me a ride. But I wasn't real specific about where I wanted to go to.That's how I ended up on the roof of Resident Services, !
I heard you were shaking all the trees on the island yesterday. Isn't that real dangerous?I've tried to make wasp buddies before, and they did not dig me shaking their tree, !
Sounded like you were busy walkin' around, whacking trees yesterday, .I just kept thinking, "Man, who needs that much wood?" You must have some crazy DIY plans, .
I heard you chopping down a lotta trees yesterday, .Why'd ya do that, ?
You planted a buncha kindsa stuff yesterday, huh? That's what I heard. Folks are talking about it.Folks are talking about how they maybe saw a Snowsquatch on a speedboat too.
I saw how yesterday you watered all the flowers, ! You made 'em real happy, !
Is it true you were making a buncha faces yesterday?I gotta start making more faces too. Making faces all the time is the kinda thing cool folks do!Like this!<10_4 /> Or this! And sometimes this!
You were traveling a lot yesterday, huh? Did somebody invite you to someplace?I'm kinda jealous! I wanna be invited someplace. A lotta someplaces have got snacks we don't have here.
I heard the airport was real busy yesterday 'cause a lotta folks were visiting! We're a tourist destination!
Sounds like you were in the DIY zone yesterday. Folks say you looked real serious doing the crafting thing.I bet you made something neat, didn't you, ?
I heard you kept breaking your tools yesterday. Lots of broken tools just means you were working real hard! Maybe too hard. Maybe ease off on the tools, .
I heard you were indoors a lot yesterday. Man, indoors is neat. It's comfy, there's snacksBut ya gotta go outside sometimes, , or your indoors start to smell too much like you.

I heard you were outdoors a bunch yesterday. I like to stay indoors, but I figured something out There's lots of small rooms indoors, but just one big room outdoors...so I'm still indoors when I'm outdoors!Plus the sunshine is in the big room, and it's nice to feel it make my head warm, .
I heard you were burying stuff yesterday. Is it true? Were they pitfall seeds? Am I gonna fall in?
I heard you fell into a bunch of pitfall holes yesterday, .Ya gotta watch your step. Trust me. I fall in 'em all the time. All the time.
Folks are saying there was all kindsa noises coming from your place yesterday. What was up? Were you rearranging your furniture? Putting in a pool? I wanna see! Can I come over sometime?
Folks say you were on your smartphone, designing stuff.Soooowere you designing stuff? I wanna see it! I love stuff!
I like talking with you! So it was real fun to chat so much.I was worried that everyone else was gonna get jealous, .
was bragging about how you two talked a bunch yesterday, .

It seemed like you were talking with everyone yesterday. You musta had a lot on your mind. Man, I got stuff on my mind.Like how my favorite snack's bag got smallerand how a fish in the river made a face at meand my feet itch.
Ya got stung by wasps yesterday? Like, a lot. <10_4 />Likea lot, a lot. <10_4 />Like A LOT, a lot. <10_4 />Likeouch!
Everyone's been talking about how you got stung by a wasp yesterday, !Man, wasp stings hurt, but not as much as crocodile bites. Life's all about perspective, .
I heard you dug up some fossils yesterday, . What kind of fossils were they?If there's fossils, there musta been dinosaurs here. We moved here too late! We could be riding dinosaurs!

I heard you were smacking a lot of rocks yesterday. Find anything good?I smack rocks to find bugs, but usually I just find Bells. So I spend those Bells on snacksAnd the snack crumbs I drop are food for the bugs in my house! It all works out! Man, nature is beautiful
Everyone's been saying that you were burying Bells yesterday.Is it true that sometimes Bells turn into trees? Man, what kinda fruit grows on that tree, ?
I heard all about how you were picking up a lot of fruits yesterday, !That must be why you smell so good, .
Folks saw you checking your NookPhone a bunch yesterday. What do you use yours for?I use all the apps all the time, 'cause I got jelly on my screen and now the apps open and close at random.
I heard you were staring into your NookPhone, like, all yesterday.Did it hypnotize you? I got real hypnotized once. My eyes got all weird, and I thought I was a bug.It wore off after a few weeks, .
I heard you made a bunch of roads yesterday. Is there someplace you need to go?
I heard you were fixing up the river yesterday. Didjaumdidja see any new fishies? In the river?Man, I'd really like it if there was a big river fulla fishies going past my house, .

I heard you were making cliff shapes yesterday! I wanna learn to do that too. I'd be a cool cliff-sculpting guy.I'd make me a cliff, like, a thousand stories tall that looked like a dragon eating a car full of sharks.Folks'd come from around the world and say, "Look at that, honey. That's art. With a capital A. Yep, it's Art."
I heard you were really into making fences yesterday. Everyone's been talking about it!I guess everybody around here is super into fences. They've even got a fence fan club. This place is goofy.
I heard you were moving the furniture outside yesterday. So, is that your new hobby?
I hacked into the mainframe and saw that you have a lotta NookPhoneCrannyIsland Miles.Actually, I watched a movie where the heroes hacked into mainframes. I don't get it, but it's fun to say.
I heard you ran out of Resident Services looking really happy and did a dance thing, .Maybe I'll go dance in front of Resident Services. Sounds like a good way to kill 10 seconds.

A few folks saw you going in and out of Nook's Cranny a bunch. Were you furniture shopping?Or did you leave something behind? Or did you just like the sound the door made? <10_4 />It's a pretty cool door.
I heard that the island tune is one you made? Oh man, it's so good! I've been singing it all morning!♪ Laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa! ♪ See? I've got it memorized!
! I heard you were the one who designed the new flag over by Resident Services. I like it! It makes me feel warm in my brain. Like when I'm eating leftover pizza for breakfast, .
Folks saw you changing outfits a lot with the transformation wand.I'd use a wand to change into my footie pajamas any time! There's a picture of sharks on 'em!
I heard you were jumping over rivers with the vaulting pole yesterday. Were you training for something?
I heard from someone that you were buying a lot of turnips from Daisy Mae!I gotta get some of your turnip recipes, .
Congrats, ! I heard you sold your turnips for a lotta Bells!I didn't know I was supposed to hold onto turnips instead of eating 'em! That's crazy, .

Folks say you were chatting a lot yesterday, but I'm thinking, "That's just what does."You chat with me sometimes. And you hit rocks. And you pick up rocks. And you sell rocks.So, I mean, yeah! You pick up rocks and you talk to folks. I dunno what's so special about that, .
Sounds like you were busy yesterday! I heard you were pulling lotsa weeds!What do you do with the weeds you collect? I shove 'em in my walls for the bugs to play with, .
I heard you changed up your hair yesterday, but I don't remember if I've seen it before right now.I don't remember lotsa stuff!
! Everyone's been talking since yesterday about how you look kinda different Don't worry! You still smell like you, and that's all I care about.
Some folks said you were taking lots of pictures yesterday. Were you just taking pictures, orWere you tracking the Islandbeast?<10_4 /> I hear it during full moons, down on the beachplaying a ukelele
I heard you spent a lot of time swimming and diving in the ocean yesterday, . I'm so jealous! I can't open my eyes underwater without getting them wet. Gah! They're getting wet now!
